about.buildingConnections: Building meaningful connections beyond the hospital walls.
about.storyP1: The idea for BeyondRounds was born during one of those late-night hospital shifts that every doctor knows all too well. After years of moving between hospitals and diving deep into the demanding world of medicine, I found myself surrounded by colleagues â€” yet genuinely lonely.
about.storyP2: I've always been social. But something was missing. Conversations always circled back to cases, protocols, and research. Professionally enriching, sure â€” but I craved something deeper:
about.storyP2Bold: real friendships that went beyond the hospital walls.
about.storyP3: Everything changed when a mutual friend introduced me to four other doctors. We discovered we shared a passion for hiking, similar music tastes, and a quirky sense of humor that only made sense to fellow physicians.
about.storyP4Bold: if I felt this isolated despite working alongside brilliant medical minds, how many other doctors were experiencing the same thing?
about.storyP5: BeyondRounds was born from this realization â€” because when you find your tribe, everything else falls into place.
about.missionPrefix: Our mission is simple: to help doctors discover friendships that
about.missionText: To help doctors discover friendships that enrich their lives outside the hospital. Because when you find your people â€” your tribe â€” everything else falls into place.
about.verifiedCommunityDesc: Only verified medical professionals, creating a trusted space for genuine connections.
about.beyondMedicineDesc: Connect over shared hobbies and interests, not just your specialty.
about.safeAndPrivateDesc: Your privacy matters. We protect your data and respect your boundaries.
about.ctaText: Join thousands of doctors who've already found their tribe. Your next great friendship is just one match away.
about.interestedInTeam: Interested in joining our team or partnering with us?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about BeyondRounds
faq.subtitleHome: Everything you need to know about BeyondRounds. Can't find what you're looking for?
faq.weAreHereToHelp: We're here to help you find your tribe.
faq.a1: BeyondRounds is a members-only social club designed exclusively for verified doctors. We use a smart matching algorithm to connect you with 3-4 fellow physicians who share your interests, lifestyle, and values â€” for real friendships, not networking.
faq.q2: How is this different from other networking apps?
faq.a2: We're not about professional networking or dating. BeyondRounds is specifically designed for doctors to make real friends who understand their lifestyle and share their personal interests outside of medicine.
faq.a3: Any verified medical doctor â€” from medical students and residents to attending physicians and specialists. We manually verify all members through medical license confirmation and photo ID to maintain trust and safety.
faq.a4: Every Thursday at 4 PM, you'll receive a curated group of 3-4 doctors matched based on shared interests, compatible schedules, and city proximity. Our algorithm considers specialty, hobbies, lifestyle preferences, and social style to find your ideal connections.
faq.q5: What if I don't connect with my group?
faq.a5: No pressure! You'll receive a fresh group every week, and our algorithm learns from your feedback to improve future matches. Great friendships take time â€” we're here to help you find your tribe.
faq.q6: Can I choose my own matches?
faq.a6: Our curated approach is what makes BeyondRounds special. Trust our algorithm â€” it's designed by doctors, for doctors, and gets smarter with each match.
faq.a7: Your group decides together! Popular spots include coffee shops, restaurants, parks, gyms, or activity-based outings like hiking or sports. RoundsBot (our AI assistant) suggests safe, convenient locations and helps break the ice.
faq.q8: Is it safe to meet people from the app?
faq.a8: Absolutely. Every member is a verified doctor, and we encourage meeting in public places. RoundsBot provides conversation starters and coordinates safe meetup spots. You can report any concerns directly through the app.
faq.q9: What if someone doesn't show up?
faq.a9: We take no-shows seriously. Members get one warning, a temporary pause after the second no-show, and potential removal after the third.
faq.a10: Trial: â‚¬9.99 (first month), Founders: â‚¬14.99/month (limited time), Core: â‚¬29.99/month, Premium: â‚¬49.99/month (includes advanced filtering and exclusive events).
faq.q11: Can I pause or cancel anytime?
faq.a11: Yes! You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings â€” no questions asked. You'll continue to receive matches until the end of your current billing period.
faq.a12: If you don't have at least 2 meaningful in-person meetups in your first 30 days, we'll refund you in full. Just email billing@beyondrounds.app with a brief note, and we'll process your refund within 5-7 business days.

pricing.noHiddenFees: No hidden fees. No long-term contracts. Just meaningful connections backed by our 30-Day Friendship Guarantee.
pricing.trialDesc: Try BeyondRounds once â€” no recurring commitment

learnMore.subtitle: BeyondRounds connects verified doctors with like-minded peers for real friendships beyond the hospital.
learnMore.step1Desc: Share your specialty, interests, and what kind of connections you're looking for. We use this to match you with doctors who have similar vibes and goals.
learnMore.step2Desc: Every week we form small groups based on compatibility. You'll be introduced to a handful of peers â€” no overwhelming feeds, just curated matches.
learnMore.step3Desc: Chat in the app, then take it offline. We help you coordinate meetups and suggest places. Real friendships happen when you meet in person.
learnMore.verifiedCommunityDesc: Only verified medical professionals in a trusted space.
learnMore.realConnectionsDesc: Designed for friendships beyond work â€” hobbies, life, and support.
learnMore.curatedMatchesDesc: Weekly small groups, not endless scrolling. Quality over quantity.
learnMore.ctaText: Join thousands of doctors who've found their tribe. Your next great friendship is one match away.

forDoctors.subtitle: BeyondRounds was built because we know what it's like to feel isolated despite being surrounded by brilliant minds. Real friendships beyond the hospital are possible.
forDoctors.soundFamiliarDesc: Many physicians share these challenges. You're not alone â€” and there's a better way to connect.
forDoctors.challenge1Desc: Long shifts and on-call duties leave little room for hobbies or social life outside the hospital.
forDoctors.challenge2Desc: You work with colleagues every day, but real friendships that go beyond cases and protocols are rare.
forDoctors.challenge3Title: Conversations always circle back to work
forDoctors.challenge3Desc: You crave connections over shared interests, not just specialty talk and research.
forDoctors.challenge4Desc: You want peers who get the lifestyle, the humor, and the challenges â€” without it feeling like another round.
forDoctors.findTribeTitle: Find your tribe â€” one match at a time
forDoctors.findTribeDesc: BeyondRounds matches you with verified doctors who share your interests and goals. Weekly small groups, real meetups, and friendships that go beyond the ward.

termsPage.title: Terms & Conditions
termsPage.section1Body: By using BeyondRounds ("the Service"), you agree to these Terms & Conditions. If you don't agree, please don't use our service.
termsPage.section2Item1: You must be a licensed medical doctor, medical student, resident, or fellow.
termsPage.section2Item2: You must be at least 18 years old.
termsPage.section2Item3: You must provide accurate verification information.
termsPage.section2Item4: You agree to maintain professional conduct at all times.
termsPage.section3Item1: You must verify your medical credentials through license upload.
termsPage.section3Item2: False information or impersonation results in immediate termination.
termsPage.section3Item3: You're responsible for maintaining account security.
termsPage.section4Item1: All subscriptions are recurring until cancelled.
termsPage.section4Item2: Prices may change with 30 days notice.
termsPage.section4Item3: Refunds only available under our 30-Day Friendship Guarantee.
termsPage.section4Item4: No partial month refunds after the guarantee period.
termsPage.section5Item1: Treat all members with respect and professionalism.
termsPage.section5Item2: Attend scheduled meetups or provide reasonable notice.
termsPage.section5Item3: Maintain confidentiality about other members' personal information.
termsPage.section6Intro: The following will result in immediate termination:
termsPage.section6Item2: Solicitation for professional services or business.
termsPage.section6Item4: Using the platform for dating or romantic purposes.
termsPage.section7Body: All content, features, and functionality are owned by BeyondRounds and protected by international copyright and trademark laws.
termsPage.section8Body: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our
termsPage.section8Suffix: for details on how we collect, use, and protect your information.
termsPage.section9Item1: Actions of other members during meetups.
termsPage.section9Item4: Loss or damage resulting from service use.
termsPage.section10Body: We may terminate accounts for violation of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service ceases immediately.
termsPage.section11Body: We may update these terms occasionally. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.
termsPage.section12Body: Questions about these terms? Contact us at

privacyPage.title: Privacy
privacyPage.highlightBody: At BeyondRounds, we're committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data responsibly. This policy explains what information we collect and how we use it.
privacyPage.section1Usage1: How you interact with the app
privacyPage.section2Item1: Matching: To connect you with compatible doctors in your area.
privacyPage.section2Item2: Communication: To send you group notifications and updates.
privacyPage.section2Item3: Improvement: To enhance our matching algorithm and user experience.
privacyPage.section2Item4: Safety: To maintain a secure and verified community.
privacyPage.section3Item1: We never sell your personal information to third parties.
privacyPage.section3Item2: We don't share your medical license details with other members.
privacyPage.section3Item3: We don't use your data for targeted advertising.
privacyPage.section3Item4: We don't share your exact location with other members.
privacyPage.section4Body: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. All medical verification documents are securely stored and only accessed by authorized personnel for verification purposes.
privacyPage.section5Item1: Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
privacyPage.section5Item3: Deletion: Request deletion of your account and data.
privacyPage.section5Item4: Export: Download your data in a portable format.
privacyPage.section6Body: We retain your information for as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, we'll remove your personal data within 30 days, except where required by law.
privacyPage.section7Body: We use essential cookies to keep you logged in and remember your preferences. We use analytics cookies to understand how you use our service and improve it.
privacyPage.section8Body: We may update this policy periodically. We'll notify you of significant changes via email or in-app notification.
privacyPage.section9Body: Questions about privacy? Contact our Data Protection Officer at

landing.heroBadge: Launching in Berlin â€” Limited Founding Spots
landing.heroHeadline: The Doctor Friendships You've Been Missing
landing.heroSubheadline: BeyondRounds matches you with 3-4 verified physicians who share your interests, lifestyle, and values â€” then helps you meet in real life, every week.
landing.heroMechanism: Every Thursday at 4 PM you receive a new group. Chat, plan, meet. Repeat.
landing.heroCTA: Join Berlin â€” It's Free to Start
landing.heroMicrocopy: No spam Â· Cancel anytime Â· Every doctor is verified
landing.problemTitle: Medicine Is Social. Doctors Are Lonely.
landing.problemSubtitle: You spend your days surrounded by people â€” yet real friendships outside the hospital are rare.
landing.problem1Desc: Hospital relationships stay professional. When you leave, the connection often ends.
landing.problem2Desc: After 12-hour shifts and on-call nights, building a social life feels impossible.
landing.problem3Desc: Non-medical friends don't understand the lifestyle. You need people who truly get it.
landing.whyFailsTitle: You've Tried Other Things. They Didn't Work.
landing.whyFailsSubtitle: Most solutions fail because they don't understand the doctor lifestyle.
landing.fail1: Networking events feel transactional â€” business cards, not friendships.
landing.fail2: Apps like Bumble BFF match strangers with nothing in common.
landing.fail3: Conference happy hours are loud, shallow, and forgettable.
landing.fail4: Hospital social events revolve around medicine â€” not your real interests.
landing.fail5: You've moved cities for training and lost your old friends along the way.
landing.mechanismSubtitle: We built this for doctors, by a doctor who experienced the same isolation.
landing.mech1: Verified-only community â€” every member is a licensed physician.
landing.mech2: AI matching on interests, lifestyle, values â€” not just specialty.
landing.mech3: Small groups of 3-4 â€” intimate enough for real conversation.
landing.mech4: Weekly cadence builds momentum â€” friendships need repetition.
landing.mech5: RoundsBot breaks the ice and suggests meetup spots.
landing.mech6: Built for busy schedules â€” flexible timing, low commitment.
landing.howSubtitle: Four simple steps from signup to your first real-life meetup.
landing.step1Desc: Tell us your interests, lifestyle, and what you're looking for. Takes 3 minutes.
landing.step2Desc: Every Thursday at 4 PM, receive a curated group of 3-4 doctors in your city.
landing.step3Desc: Your group chat opens instantly. RoundsBot helps break the ice and suggests places.
landing.step4Desc: Coffee, dinner, hiking â€” whatever your group decides. Real friendships start here.
landing.howAfterDesc: Great matches stay connected. Average groups meet 3+ times. Many become lasting friendships â€” exactly what we designed for.
landing.offerSubtitle: No hidden fees. No long-term contracts. Start free with our trial.
landing.offerTrialDesc: Try it once, no strings attached
landing.offerTrialF1: One week of curated group matching
landing.guaranteeDesc: If you don't have at least 2 meaningful in-person meetups in your first 30 days, we'll refund you in full. No questions asked. Email billing@beyondrounds.app.
landing.for1: You're a doctor who wants real friendships outside the hospital
landing.for2: You've moved to a new city and want to rebuild your social life
landing.for3: You prefer small, curated groups over large networking events
landing.for4: You value shared interests and lifestyle over specialty connections
landing.notForTitle: BeyondRounds is NOT for you ifâ€¦
landing.notFor1: You're looking for professional networking or job opportunities
landing.notFor2: You want a dating app for doctors
landing.notFor3: You prefer online-only connections without meeting in person
landing.notFor4: You're not willing to show up and invest in new friendships
landing.testimonial1Quote: I moved to Berlin for my residency and knew nobody. BeyondRounds matched me with three doctors who love hiking and board games â€” we meet every other week now.
landing.testimonial2Quote: Finally, a platform that understands I want friends, not contacts. The small group format makes it easy to actually connect.
landing.testimonial3Quote: After 10 years in medicine, I'd almost given up on making new friends. My first BeyondRounds group changed that.
landing.faq1A: Any verified medical doctor â€” from medical students and residents to attending physicians and specialists. We manually verify all members through medical license confirmation.
landing.faq2A: Every Thursday at 4 PM, you receive a curated group of 3-4 doctors matched by shared interests, compatible schedules, and city proximity. Our algorithm considers specialty, hobbies, lifestyle, and social style.
landing.faq3A: If you don't have at least 2 meaningful in-person meetups in your first 30 days, we refund you in full. Just email billing@beyondrounds.app.
landing.faq4A: Yes. Cancel from your account settings â€” no questions asked. You'll keep receiving matches until the end of your current billing period.
landing.finalTitle: Your Next Great Friendship Is One Match Away
landing.finalSubtitle: Join 500+ doctors in Berlin who are done being lonely. Get matched this Thursday.
landing.finalCTA: Join Berlin â€” It's Free to Start
